translation.en: [woman] Christmas is almost here.
And after that day, I know my life will never be the same.
translation.zh:
‎那天之后
‎我知道自己的人生会就此改变

translation.en: I'm a little scared.
Well, to be honest, a lot scared.
What will happen to me, to us?
And then there's little Jacob.
What about him?
I just hope he'll be okay.
-[fan] There he is! -[crowd cheering]
How's everybody doing? See you in there. Thanks for coming.
translation.zh: ‎各位都好吗？里面见 谢谢大家过来

translation.en: In Book Five, will we finally learn the truth about Camille?
translation.zh:
‎第五本书里
‎我们终于能知道卡米尔的真相了吗？

translation.en: Is she part of the French Resistance like she says?
translation.zh:
‎她真的像自己说的那样
‎是个法国抵抗运动成员吗？

translation.en: Or is she really a Nazi spy? You know, I've been going back and forth on that one.
translation.zh:
‎-还是说她其实是个纳粹间谍？
‎-我一直在犹豫呢

translation.en: [gasps] Make her a heroine! Oh, it's so much more romantic.
translation.zh: ‎让她成为女英雄吧 那样会更浪漫

translation.en: -Yeah… -Then again, a spy is sexier.
Hmm! You know what? -[whispers] Double agent. -[fan exclaims]
Could you inscribe it to Sherri, please? I'm Sherri.
translation.zh: ‎能请你写上“致雪莉”吗？我是雪莉

translation.en: So is it an "I" or a "Y"?
Either is fine.
You recognize me, non? Book Three.
[in French] Of course, of course! Camille Toussaint. How are you?
translation.zh:
‎当然啦！卡米尔·图森！
‎最近怎么样？

translation.en: Very well, sir. Very well.
translation.zh: ‎非常好 先生 非常好

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Camille.
Thank you so much!
[in English] Make it out to Todd and Mark. Sure.
translation.zh:
‎-你能写上致托德和马克吗？
‎-当然可以

translation.en: Oh, make that Mark and Todd. I read the book first.
translation.zh:
‎还是写马克和托德吧
‎我先看的那本书

translation.en: [Todd] No way. Don't you remember? Your sister gave it to me.
translation.zh: ‎你忘记了吗？是你姐姐送给我的

translation.en: -No, your sister gave it to me-- -[Jacob] Tell you what, fellas.
translation.zh:
‎-不 是你姐姐给我…
‎-听我说 伙计们

translation.en: You know what I'm gonna do? I'm gonna go ahead and sign two books. One for each of you, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我签两本书 你们每人一本 好吗？

translation.en: My treat. There you go.
So, are you staying in the city for the holidays?
I'm afraid not. -Gotta get home to my girl, Ava. -Oh.
translation.zh: ‎恐怕不会 我得回家看我女儿艾娃

translation.en: I didn't know that you were…
Well, she's a very lucky woman.
-Merry Christmas. -Merry Christmas.
Ava, hon, I'm home!
translation.zh: ‎艾娃 宝贝 我回家了

translation.en: Ava?
-[whines and barks] -Come here! Come here, baby. What's up? How are you? Come here! Hi! Hi!
translation.zh:
‎过来！来这里 宝贝
‎怎么样？你好吗？过来！嗨！

translation.en: -Welcome home, Mr. Jacob. -Oh, thanks, Svet. Thanks.
translation.zh:
‎-欢迎回家 雅各布先生
‎-谢谢你 斯维特

translation.en: [Jacob] Hi, how are you? Hello!
-Everything under control? Yeah? -Mmm-hmm.
-Yeah. Refrigerator is full. Ava has bath. -Yeah. Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-对 冰箱补齐了 艾娃洗了澡
‎-好的

translation.en: I bring in extra firewood.
Oh, and, uh, fan mail.
[laughs] More even than last book, I think.
Wow. Okay, fan mail. Look at that.
translation.zh: ‎哇 粉丝来信 你看看

translation.en: Now I know what I'm doing for the next couple weeks, right?
translation.zh: ‎我知道接下来几周要做什么了

translation.en: Thank you for holding down the fort while I was gone.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你在我离开期间照看这里

translation.en: -Mmm-hmm. -Oh, I almost forgot.
-This, Svetlana, is for you. -Oh!
translation.zh: ‎斯维特拉娜 这是给你的

translation.en: Happy holidays.
-And, you know, thank you for everything. -Oh, thank you.
You're gonna be okay, Mr. Jacob?
translation.zh: ‎你会好好的吧 雅各布先生？

translation.en: Okay? Yeah, what do you mean? It's me. Of course. I'm always okay.
translation.zh:
‎好？什么意思？
‎我就这样 一直都挺好的

translation.en: But also always alone.
I'm alone because I prefer it that way, you know that. Besides, I'm not alone.
translation.zh:
‎我一个人是因为我更喜欢那样 ‎再说了 我有最好的女儿艾娃
‎它会陪着我

translation.en: I got my best girl here, Ava. She'll keep me company.
translation.zh:
‎再说了 我有最好的女儿艾娃
‎它会陪着我

translation.en: -See you next year, Mr. Jacob. -Yeah! See you, you know…
translation.zh:
‎-明年见 雅各布先生
‎-好的 再见 你懂的…

translation.en: Ava! [clicks tongue] Come here.
Let's, uh, see what we got here.
-[jazz music playing on radio] -Ah, there we go. All right.
I could get down with that. That's good. That is good.
-Hello? -[man] Hi, is this, uh, Jacob Turner?
translation.zh:
‎-喂？
‎-嗨 您是雅各布·特纳吗？

translation.en: Yeah, this is,
but, you know, I don't need my carpets cleaned, or a home loan, or--
translation.zh: ‎我不需要清理地毯或家庭贷款…

translation.en: Yeah. Uh, Mr. Turner, apologies. I was, uh… hesitant to leave a message.
translation.zh:
‎好的 特纳先生 抱歉
‎我本来犹豫要不要留言的

translation.en: My name is Matt Segreto. I'm an attorney--
translation.zh: ‎我叫马特·塞格雷托 是一名律师…

translation.en: Oh, let me guess. You have a client who claims I stole one of their ideas.
translation.zh:
‎让我猜猜 你有个客户说
‎我偷了他们的想法

translation.en: No, um…
I'm the executor of your mother's estate.
I'm sorry. You're, uh… What was that?
I really am sorry to be the one to tell you. Uh…
She passed last week.
I thought you knew.
No, I… I didn't know that.
[Jacob] My mother and I hadn't spoken in a long time.
translation.zh: ‎我妈妈已经很久没和我说过话了

translation.en: Our relationship was, uh…
complicated.
[Matt on phone] I understand.
She left everything to you, um, her house and all her furnishings.
translation.zh:
‎她把一切都留给你了
‎包括她的房子和家具

translation.en: There's some paperwork that needs to be signed.
Um, I can arrange to meet you in Bridgeport one day next week,
translation.zh: ‎我可以下周和你在布里奇波特见面

translation.en: if that's convenient.
-[Matt] Mr. Turner. -Hey!
Matt Segreto.
-Thanks for meeting me out here. -Yeah.
-I'm so sorry for your loss. -Thank you.
Place must bring back a lot of memories.
translation.zh: ‎这个地方一定让你想起很多往事

translation.en: You have no idea.
-[Jacob] You just, uh… -Yeah.
[Jacob] Careful.
Whoa.
Yeah, neighbors said she rarely left the house.
And when they dropped by, she never let them in.
translation.zh:
‎他们路过的时候
‎她从来不邀请人家进来

translation.en: Now I know why.
Should be a piano hiding over here somewhere.
Um, yep. According to the inventory, it's a Steinway Model S, 1940.
translation.zh:
‎对 根据清单显示
‎这是一台1940年的施坦威S型

translation.en: It's worth about 40 grand.
From the look of things, you're gonna be doing a lot of trash runs.
translation.zh: ‎乍一看 你得丢掉不少东西

translation.en: Do you want me to get a dumpster rental for you?
Oh, uh… Yeah. -Thanks. -Yeah.
And, um, Mr. Turner…
Jake. [chuckles]
I hate to bother you, but my wife is just a huge fan, and, um…
translation.zh:
‎我不想麻烦你
‎但我太太是你的忠实粉丝…

translation.en: Okay. [clears throat]
You know, us Regular Joes can never really live up to the super-suave dudes in your books. [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎像我们这种普通人
‎永远没法像你书里人物那样温文尔雅

translation.en: Those dudes aren't real, Matt.
translation.zh: ‎那些家伙又不是真的 马特

translation.en: Yeah, tell that to my wife.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 去跟我的老婆说吧

translation.en: Her name's Mercedes.
Like the car.
[chuckles] Right. -Here you go. -Thank you.
Come on, babe.
All right, you ready? Hop on up.
Good girl.
Simply exquisite.
Ellie, is that you?
Jacob, you came!
Of course.
I don't know, somehow I assumed that you'd send an assistant or someone,
translation.zh:
‎我都不知道
‎还以为你会派个助理或者谁回来

translation.en: I guess because you're so famous now.
No, some things you gotta do on your own. So good to see you. You look great.
translation.zh:
‎有些事必须自己做
‎很高兴见到你 你看起来很棒

translation.en: You too. It's been a long time. What, it's 20 years, probably?
translation.zh: ‎你也是 好久不见 大概有20年了吧

translation.en: -You were about 18 when you left. -17 when I left.
translation.zh:
‎-你离开的时候大概18岁
‎-我离开的时候17岁

translation.en: [Ellie] That was a really tough time for you.
translation.zh: ‎当时你真的过得太不容易了

translation.en: [Jacob] Yeah, it was.
But, you know, I always knew you'd be a writer.
You were an interesting kid.
You had a wonderful imagination, and you loved words.
translation.zh: ‎你的想象力很奇妙 你喜欢文字

translation.en: I remember sitting in your den for hours, playing online Scrabble.
translation.zh:
‎我记得曾在你家书房坐了几个小时
‎一直玩在线拼字游戏

translation.en: Oh, whenever your mom had a really bad day.
Mom had a lot of bad days, didn't she? She was never the same.
translation.zh:
‎-我妈当时经常心情抑郁 是吧？
‎-她和以前不一样了

translation.en: [Jacob] None of us were.
-They're good! -[Ellie laughs]
-Oh, wonderful. -[Jacob] That's sweet. Thank you.
-[Ellie] Bye-bye now. -Bye.
Hey, are you still painting?
You might as well ask if I'm still breathing.
Listen, I'm glad I ran into you. It's good to see you.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴遇到你 能看到你真好

translation.en: I'm about ready to take off. I gotta, um…
I gotta come back tomorrow and tackle another room.
translation.zh: ‎我明天还会回来 整理另一个房间

translation.en: It's gotta be really, really hard going through all her stuff.
translation.zh: ‎要整理出她的所有东西一定很辛苦

translation.en: Yeah. What was it that Robert Frost always said?
translation.zh:
‎对 罗伯特·弗罗斯特有一句话
‎怎么说的来着？

translation.en: He said, "The best way out is always through," right?
translation.zh:
‎他说：“最好的出路
‎永远都是勇往直前” 对吗？

translation.en: Although I'm pretty sure he never met a hoarder.
translation.zh: ‎但我很肯定他没遇见过囤货控

translation.en: I would imagine not.
[Jacob] It's lonely out here.
And I miss you.
Oh, God! Oh, come on!
Oh, come on, Mom, really?
translation.zh: ‎拜托 妈妈 非要这样吗？

translation.en: -What? -[Ava whines]
Still like a grilled cheese with tomato soup?
translation.zh: ‎你还喜欢烤芝士三明治配番茄汤吗？

translation.en: I figured you'd probably worked up a pretty good appetite by now.
translation.zh: ‎我猜你整理一番后 胃口一定不错

translation.en: You kidding? I'm starving.
-Does she like tomato soup? Is this okay? -She loves it. Yeah. Yeah, it's great.
translation.zh:
‎-它喜欢番茄汤吗？这个可以吗？
‎-它很喜欢 可以 麻烦了

translation.en: [Ellie] Oh, there you go.
-Oh, she does! -Look at that!
We don't know how to thank you. Do we, Ava?
translation.zh:
‎我们不知道该怎么感谢你
‎是不是 艾娃？

translation.en: -You could put me in your next novel. -Whoa, whoa, hold on a second.
translation.zh: ‎把我写进你的下一本小说里 ‎哇 等一下 你真的读过我的小说？

translation.en: You actually read my novels?
translation.zh: ‎哇 等一下 你真的读过我的小说？

translation.en: I'm probably the only one of your readers who can recognize some of the characters.
translation.zh:
‎我可能是你的读者里
‎唯一能认出一些人物的人

translation.en: Like whom, for instance?
-Well, in Green Eyes. -Green Eyes of Paris.
Yeah, the photographer.
Beautiful, strong woman who has a breakdown.
translation.zh: ‎那个崩溃的美丽坚强的女人

translation.en: Well, that one's pretty obvious, though, right?
There's another character I recognize, you know, in The Final Midnight.
translation.zh:
‎我还在《最后的午夜》里
‎认出了另一个角色

translation.en: The father of the soldier.
Very minor character, though. Sort of like in real life.
translation.zh:
‎非常小的角色
‎有点像现实生活中的人物

translation.en: Your memories of him can't be all that bad if you're still wearing his watch.
translation.zh:
‎你对他的回忆不可能全是不好的
‎毕竟你还戴着他的手表

translation.en: He came to your mother's funeral. Did you know that?
translation.zh:
‎他来参加了你母亲的丧礼
‎你知道吗？

translation.en: To pay his respects, but I'm pretty sure he was hoping to see you there.
translation.zh:
‎说是为了吊唁
‎但我肯定他是希望在这里见到你

translation.en: No, I don't…
I don't think so, no.
And the funeral… the funeral, I feel…
It's understandable, but it doesn't matter anymore.
That was then. This is now.
translation.zh: ‎都是之前的事情了 现在是现在

translation.en: Thanks.
-[Ellie] And can I ask you a question? -Yeah.
-It's personal. -Sure.
Am I too old for this?
translation.zh: ‎我对这个来说是不是太老了？

translation.en: [Jake laughs] Are-- -This is your question? -Yes.
No! No.
-Seriously? -This is perfect.
Have you tried one of these? Of course not. Why would you?
translation.zh:
‎你试过这些吗？
‎当然没有 你怎么会用？

translation.en: You got women linin' up on your doorstep.
translation.zh: ‎你家门口的女人都得排队了

translation.en: [laughing] I do not have women lining up on my doorstep.
I see those magazines at the supermarket. You date movie stars.
translation.zh:
‎我在超市读过那些杂志
‎你和电影明星们约会

translation.en: [laughing] All right. Listen, they will print anything.
But the answer to your question, no, I have not tried a dating app,
translation.zh:
‎我好好回答你的问题
‎我没有试过约会应用

translation.en: but I think you absolutely should.
I have to write something.
-Dating profile? -Yeah.
I know a writer. May I?
translation.zh: ‎我认识一个作家 我来吧？

translation.en: -You're gonna write my profile? Oh! -It would be my pleasure.
translation.zh:
‎-你要帮我写个人资料？
‎-这是我的荣幸

translation.en: -[knock on door] -Come on in, Ellie. Door's open.
translation.zh: ‎进来吧 埃莉 门开着

translation.en: -Hello? -You're not Ellie.
Uh, no. No, I'm not.
No, it's just-- I thought you were my neighbor. Oh, sorry.
translation.zh:
‎-不 我刚以为你是我的邻居
‎-抱歉

translation.en: You were here before, right? -You were across the street? -Yeah. Yeah, that was me.
translation.zh:
‎-你之前来过这里 在街对面是吗？
‎-对 是我

translation.en: I'm not some kind of weird stalker or anything, if that's what you're thinking.
translation.zh:
‎我不是什么奇怪的跟踪狂
‎你别那么想

translation.en: No, I didn't think you were. Could you close the door behind you?
translation.zh:
‎我没觉得你是
‎你能关上后面的门吗？

translation.en: -Do you mind? -Yeah, of course. Yeah, um…
What can I do for you? -[Ava whines] -Hey. He's cute. Good boy.
translation.zh:
‎-有什么事吗？
‎-嘿 它很可爱 好小子

translation.en: Girl, actually. That's Ava.
translation.zh: ‎其实它是个女孩 那是艾娃

translation.en: -Cool name. Hey, Ava. -[whines]
translation.zh: ‎很酷的名字 嘿 艾娃

translation.en: This is the Turner residence, right?
[sighs] Sort of. Sort of. Uh, I'm Jake Turner.
Great. Nice to meet you, Mr. Turner.
translation.zh: ‎很好 很高兴认识你 特纳先生

translation.en: My name's Rachel Campbell. And the reason I'm here…
translation.zh:
‎我叫瑞秋·坎贝尔
‎我来这里的原因…

translation.en: Sorry, this is a little complicated, but I'm trying to find my mother.
translation.zh:
‎对不起 稍微有点复杂
‎但我是试着来寻找母亲的

translation.en: And I think you might be able to help me.
She used to live here a long time ago, I think. I hope.
translation.zh:
‎她很久以前应该住在这里
‎我希望如此

translation.en: Your mother lived here in this house?
Yeah, um, when I was born… Rather, right before I was born, she lived…
translation.zh:
‎没错 我刚出生…
‎其实 是在我出生之前

translation.en: This is Scott and Lois Turner's house, right?
translation.zh: ‎这里是斯科特和洛伊斯·特纳的家？

translation.en: Yeah. Uh, well, yeah. My parents.
Great. So, yeah, my birth mother, she lived here and she worked for them.
translation.zh:
‎很好 我的生母就住在这里
‎为他们工作

translation.en: Your mother worked for my parents?
From what I can tell, she was actually their nanny.
translation.zh: ‎据我所知 她应该是他们的保姆

translation.en: Whoa! No! Oh, whoa, whoa! No, no, no! Okay, hold on! Hold--
translation.zh: ‎哇！不 ‎好的 等一下 等等…

translation.en: Ow! That's hot.
You need a hand? [chuckling] No, no, it's… -I got it under control. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-要搭把手吗？
‎-不 我有数的

translation.en: -[Jacob] Ah, forget it. -Okay.
So what brings Nancy Drew to the Turner house, anyway?
translation.zh:
‎是什么风把神探南希
‎吹到特纳家来了？

translation.en: -If you don't mind me asking. -[laughs]
translation.zh: ‎如果你不介意我这么问的话

translation.en: It wasn't easy. My adoption file was sealed.
translation.zh: ‎过程不容易 我的收养档案被密封了

translation.en: But a friend of mine worked for the Connecticut Records Department.
translation.zh: ‎有个在康涅狄格州档案馆工作的朋友

translation.en: By law, he couldn't tell me my mom's name,
translation.zh: ‎根据法律 他不能说出我母亲的姓名

translation.en: but he could tell me her last known address which was here, so…
translation.zh:
‎但是他能告诉我
‎她最后的地址就是这里

translation.en: I understand, but I'm sorry. I'm sorry, I…
I was just about ready to head out. I wish I could help you.
translation.zh: ‎我现在正要出门 希望我能帮到你

translation.en: -I don't think I can, though. -No, I totally understand.
translation.zh:
‎-但我觉得自己做不到
‎-我明白

translation.en: I guess I just gotta learn to leave the table.
Nina Simone.
That's right. Yeah, she's the best.
-One of your favorites? -She is.
-You got any others? -Uh, Peggy Lee, Ella, Lady Day.
translation.zh:
‎-你还喜欢其他人吗？
‎-佩琪·李 艾拉 戴夫人

translation.en: -Aretha. -Mmm. Oh, don't forget about Gladys.
[laughs] Oh, Gladys the Baddest. My dad…
He was my own personal musicologist, taught me everybody.
translation.zh:
‎他对我来说是个音乐学家
‎是他让我认识了这些人

translation.en: Like Little Richard, Marvin Gaye.
-Marvin. We lost him when I was a kid. -'84.
translation.zh:
‎-马文 我还是个孩子时他就走了
‎-1984年

translation.en: -Yeah. Yep. -You in music or something?
translation.zh:
‎对 对 ‎-你是做音乐的吗？
‎-不 我是…

translation.en: No. No, no, I'm a…
translation.zh:
‎-你是做音乐的吗？
‎-不 我是…

translation.en: -I write a little bit. -Really? Cool! Anything I know?
translation.zh:
‎-我写点东西
‎-真的吗？酷 有我知道的吗？

translation.en: Uh… You know, no, probably not.
-No? Anything I'd like? -No. No, probably not. [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎-没有？有什么我喜欢的吗？
‎-不 可能没有

translation.en: -Struggling artist? I get it. -Ah…
Well, I guess we're all struggling in one way or another, huh?
Ain't that the truth.
Listen, I'm sorry I couldn't help you with your mom. Yeah. Don't apologize.
translation.zh:
‎-很抱歉 我无法回答你的问题
‎-好 不用道歉

translation.en: Honestly, just being in the house where she once lived makes me feel…
translation.zh:
‎老实说 出现在她曾经住过的屋子
‎已经让我觉得…

translation.en: I don't know… [sighs] …more connected to her somehow.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 和她更近了一些

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah.
Anyway, thanks.
-Um, thank you. Yeah. -Oh.
Oops. [laughs] Merry Christmas.
-Merry Christmas to you. -Thank you.
-[Jacob] Wait, Ellie. Wait-- Rachel! -[car driving off]
Rachel, wait!
I have an idea.
Thing is, my neighbor's been living here for years, and I was thinking she…
translation.zh:
‎我的邻居在这里住了很多年
‎我觉得她…

translation.en: [Ellie chuckling] I feel the same way.
Well, that was quick.
[Rachel] What?
Uh, nothing. I'll explain later.
Listen, why don't I, um, give you my phone number? And then you can just text me tomorrow.
translation.zh:
‎不如我把电话号码留给你
‎这样你明天就可以给我发信息了

translation.en: -I'm sure I'll have spoken to her by then. -Oh, that would be great.
translation.zh:
‎-到时候我会跟她说的
‎-那就太好了

translation.en: Actually, you know what? Um… I think I might just wait until she's back.
translation.zh: ‎其实 我想我还是等她回来吧

translation.en: -I'll wait in my car. -You sure? She might be a while.
translation.zh:
‎-我在车里等
‎-你确定吗？她可能需要一会儿

translation.en: -I've come this far, so… -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-反正已经走到这了 所以…
‎-好

translation.en: -Okay. -Yup.
Thanks.
-Hey. -Hey.
What's up?
Are you hungry? I was gonna grab a bite, if you're hungry.
translation.zh:
‎你饿吗？我准备去找点吃的
‎你要饿的话一起吧

translation.en: -[Rachel] Very cool. -Mmm-hmm. -So is this an old haunt or… -No.
translation.zh: ‎好酷啊 所以这里是你的据点还是…？

translation.en: I haven't been here in years, actually,
translation.zh: ‎不 我已经离开这里好多年了

translation.en: but my mom used to take me here a lot when I was a kid.
translation.zh: ‎但我小时候 妈妈带我来过好多次

translation.en: -She loved this place. -I can see why. It's nice.
translation.zh:
‎-她喜欢这个地方
‎-我能理解她 真好

translation.en: -Welcome to Trattoria Toscana. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-欢迎来到托斯卡纳餐厅
‎-谢谢

translation.en: I am Vittorio. May I share tonight's specials?
translation.zh:
‎我是维托里奥
‎要我介绍下今晚的特色菜吗？

translation.en: [in English] Could you repeat in English?
translation.zh: ‎你能用英语重复一下特色菜吗？

translation.en: No, no, it's… it's fine. I'll just have whatever she's having.
translation.zh: ‎不 没关系 我跟她点一样的就行

translation.en: -Ah. -Oh, and a glass of wine, please.
-Do you want one? -Uh, no, no.
You sure?
-[in English] What's that last thing? -Oh, it's, um…
-Separate checks. Yeah. -Separate checks?
You're a writer and I just want to respect that.
translation.zh: ‎你是个作家 我想尊重你

translation.en: Both of my parents are artists. They make and sell their own jewelry.
translation.zh:
‎我的父母是艺术家
‎他们自己生产和销售首饰

translation.en: So as you can imagine, it's, uh… there have been times when the bills have been challenging.
translation.zh:
‎你能想象到
‎总有些时候手头会有点紧

translation.en: So I figure it's better to--
I'm sure you can understand and appreciate that sometimes it's--
-Thank you. I appreciate it. Nice of you. -Yeah. Yeah, of course.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你 我很感激 你真好
‎-没事 应该的

translation.en: So you speak fluent Italian. How'd that happen?
translation.zh:
‎你的意大利语说得很流利
‎怎么做到的？

translation.en: Well, actually, I also speak French and German.
translation.zh: ‎其实 我还会说法语和德语

translation.en: Little bit of Mandarin.
-You speak a little Mandarin? -A bit.
[in Mandarin] I kid you not!
[in English] No, it's… I'm a language major, so…
-Got it. Cool. You don't hear that-- -Grazie.
translation.zh:
‎-知道了 太酷了 你没听到…
‎-你知道

translation.en: Thank you very much.
Um, so how do you while away the hours these days?
translation.zh: ‎这些天来 你都做什么消磨时光呢？

translation.en: Actually, I just applied for a job as a translator at the UN.
translation.zh: ‎其实我刚申请了联合国的翻译工作

translation.en: -It's a long shot. -Long shot? Why is it a long shot?
Isn't everything?
-Um, sorry, I should take this. -Sure. No problem. -One second. -Sure.
translation.zh:
‎-抱歉 我要接一下 稍等
‎-好的 没问题 好的

translation.en: I'll see you at the table, all right? Welcome home, stranger!
translation.zh: ‎回头座位上见 ‎欢迎回家 陌生人

translation.en: Dion, hey! How are you?
-Man, how long has it been? -It's been a while. 12th grade.
translation.zh:
‎-多久没见了？
‎-有一阵子了 上次还是12年级

translation.en: Yeah, you disappeared. Where did you go to college, anyway?
translation.zh: ‎你消失了 你去哪上的大学？

translation.en: You know, I didn't go. I ended up… I went to Paris. School of life.
translation.zh: ‎我没上学 我去了巴黎 生活即是学校

translation.en: Oh, that's right. You look exactly the same.
translation.zh: ‎没错 你看起来还是一模一样

translation.en: Only richer.
Is it true they're turning your new book into a movie?
translation.zh: ‎他们把你的新书改成电影了？

translation.en: I don't know. I mean, this is what they say.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 是这么说来着

translation.en: -Hometown hero. -Thank you very much. You're very kind.
translation.zh:
‎-故乡之光
‎-非常感谢 你真好

translation.en: -It's great seeing you, man. -Good to see you.
translation.zh:
‎-很高兴见到你
‎-很高兴见到你

translation.en: Sorry about that.
-Where were we? -We were, um…
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我们说到哪了？ ‎我们…

translation.en: Potential job. UN. Long shot.
translation.zh: ‎可能的工作 联合国 希望渺茫

translation.en: Yeah, it's…
I don't know, with this new job, it could be challenging. I don't know.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道 这份新工作
‎可能会很有挑战性

translation.en: -We may have to move and it's just… -"We"?
translation.zh:
‎-我们可能要搬家 那个…
‎-“我们”

translation.en: Yeah, Alan and me.
-And Alan is? -Oh, God, sorry. Alan's my fiancé.
translation.zh:
‎-艾伦是哪位？
‎-天啊 抱歉 艾伦是我的未婚夫

translation.en: Oh, you're engaged?
Mmm-hmm. Yeah. Hey, congratulations. I love love.
translation.zh:
‎-对
‎-嘿 恭喜你 我喜欢爱情故事

translation.en: -Great. Thank you. -Cheers. This is wonderful.
translation.zh:
‎-很好 谢谢
‎-干杯 太好了

translation.en: Um, we haven't set a date yet.
And Alan wants to, but if I do get this job, then…
translation.zh:
‎艾伦想定下来
‎但如果我得到这份工作 那么…

translation.en: I don't-- We'll just have to figure it out, I guess. Haven't even looked for engagement rings yet.
translation.zh:
‎我们就得想办法了
‎我们甚至都没去看订婚戒指

translation.en: Well, we went last week, and I don't know, I couldn't pick anything.
translation.zh: ‎我们上周是去看了 但我什么都没选

translation.en: So I just… we just left and then…
Actually, this was kind of cute. On the walk home, he gave me this.
translation.zh:
‎其实还挺可爱的
‎在回家的路上 他给了我这个

translation.en: -[Jacob] What's that? -It's…
Cigar ring.
Believe it or not, this silly ring came as kind of a relief.
translation.zh: ‎这个蠢蠢的戒指让我松了一口气

translation.en: -Yeah? -I'm not into all that "Diamonds Are a Girl's Best Friend" kind of stuff.
translation.zh:
‎我不喜欢“钻石是女孩的好朋友”
‎那一套的东西

translation.en: The truth is I'm kind of ambivalent about the concept of being engaged.
translation.zh:
‎事实是 我对订婚这个想法
‎感觉有点矛盾

translation.en: -Mmm-hmm. -One the one hand, I like the certainty,
but on the other, it makes you feel kind of boxed in, you know?
translation.zh: ‎但我又觉得被圈住了 你懂吗？

translation.en: Yeah, no, "boxed in" is something I've managed to avoid my entire life.
translation.zh: ‎“被圈住”是我一生都在逃避的东西

translation.en: In my case, it's tricky 'cause Alan likes doing things by the book.
translation.zh:
‎我的事情很棘手
‎因为艾伦喜欢按章办事

translation.en: And it's important to respect what the other person wants. Right?
translation.zh: ‎要尊重对方的心意也很重要 对吧？

translation.en: -Mmm-hmm. -But he's a tax attorney!
He's very, very good at his job, and he's super precise.
translation.zh: ‎他非常擅长自己的工作 超级精准

translation.en: Believe me, he'll be the one planning our wedding down to the very last place card.
translation.zh:
‎他会负责策划我们的婚礼
‎落实到每一张座位牌

translation.en: It's gonna run like clockwork.
And the good thing is, then I promise I'll shut up, but I think, I don't know, Alan and I complement one another.
translation.zh:
‎好事情是 我保证自己会闭嘴
‎我觉得艾伦和我很互补

translation.en: And that's how it's… It's supposed to be like that, right?
I mean, I'm not an expert on the subject, but, yeah, that sounds about right.
translation.zh: ‎我不是这方面的专家 但听起来不错

translation.en: Well, for better or worse, I am.
I don't know, I think being adopted, I'm just…
translation.zh: ‎因为我是被收养的 我觉得我总是…

translation.en: I'm always trying to fill some kind of void.
translation.zh: ‎我总是在试着填补某种空虚感

translation.en: I'm always looking for security and reliability,
translation.zh: ‎我一直在寻找安全感和依靠

translation.en: and that's why I think if I find my real-- my birth mom, it's…
translation.zh:
‎所以我才会觉得
‎如果我找到真的…亲生妈妈…

translation.en: I don't know, it'll resolve this huge uncertainty in my life and then…
translation.zh:
‎会解决我生活中的
‎巨大不确定性 然后…

translation.en: -I don't know. -You'll be free.
-Yeah. -Come on.
[Rachel] Honestly, I really would have been happy to split it.
[Jacob] Oh, come on. No, it was my pleasure. Good food, good company.
translation.zh:
‎不 这是我的荣幸
‎好的食物 好的陪伴

translation.en: That's a three-hour date.
I guess the universe really does reward the brave.
[sighs] I should probably tackle another room.
Hey, um, I was actually wondering, do you think there's a…
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我其实在想 ‎你觉得你父母有没有可能

translation.en: there's a chance your parents kept something of my mother's?
A card? A photo?
Anything?
-[Rachel grunts] Yeah. Okay. -Be careful now.
-[Jacob] You got it? All right. -Yeah. Okay.
-[Jacob] Plop it right here's fine. -Oh, God.
-Is there a dead body in there? -I'm afraid to look to be honest with you.
-Hey, who played? -Huh?
Oh, my mom forced me to take lessons when I was a kid.
-At first, I pretty much hated it. -And then?
Then it made her really happy to hear me play, so…
translation.zh: ‎听了我的演奏 她很开心 所以…

translation.en: Will you play something for me?
-Play something for you? Come on. No. -Seriously.
Seriously, I wanna see if the piano sounds as beautiful as it looks.
translation.zh:
‎我想听听钢琴的音色
‎是不是像看上去那么好

translation.en: Please?
All right. It's been a while, so I'm probably a little rusty.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 好久没弹 可能有点生疏

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause your mama's all alone ♪
♪ I have tried in vain ♪
♪ Never more to call your name ♪
♪ When you left, you broke my heart ♪
translation.zh: ‎你离开的时候 让我心碎

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause I never thought we'd part ♪
♪ Every hour in the day You will hear me say ♪
translation.zh: ‎每天每时每刻 你都会听到我说

translation.en: ♪ Baby, won't you please come home? ♪
♪ Oh, home ♪
♪ Baby ♪
♪ Won't you please come home? ♪
Wow.
[Rachel] Ah! Young love.
-[Ellie] Hi! -So how was the date?
It went well.
Just well?
It went very well.
This is my friend, Rachel. -[Ellie] Hi! -Hi, nice to meet you.
translation.zh:
‎-这是我的朋友 瑞秋
‎-很高兴认识你

translation.en: Rachel's got a question I think maybe only you can answer.
translation.zh: ‎瑞秋有个问题 我想只有你能回答

translation.en: [Ellie] Of course, I remember her.
She was a babysitter, a live-in babysitter,
like, you know, like an au pair.
[Rachel] Right. Right, sure.
She was very young. Seventeen, maybe 18 at the most.
translation.zh: ‎她当时很年轻 17岁 最多18岁

translation.en: She must have moved before the baby was born.
translation.zh: ‎她肯定是在孩子出生前搬走的

translation.en: Do you remember her name or…
Gosh, that's a good question.
Seems like it had something to do with Christmas,
like, um, Christina or Joy.
I'm drawing a blank, but you know who would know?
translation.zh:
‎我想不起来了
‎但是你知道谁清楚吗？

translation.en: -Who's that? -Your dad.
No, I don't, um… No.
Well, anyway, he lives in Vermont now.
translation.zh: ‎总之 他现在住在佛蒙特州

translation.en: It's way up in the mountains in a little town called Cornwall Bridge,
translation.zh:
‎在一个叫康沃尔桥的小镇里
‎往山上去的地方

translation.en: living pretty much off the grid.
How do you… [sighs] How do you know all that?
When I saw him at the funeral, we had a nice long chat.
translation.zh:
‎我在葬礼上看到他
‎我们好好聊了一番

translation.en: You know, I really don't think there would be any harm in talking--
translation.zh: ‎我真的不觉得聊聊会有什么不好…

translation.en: "Harm in talking"? No, there will be harm. I haven't spoken to the guy in 35 years, Ellie, come on.
translation.zh:
‎“聊聊有什么不好”？是不好
‎我已经35年没和他说过话

translation.en: [hesitates] No, I'm aware, but--
No, no, no. I'm… Excuse me.
Sorry. It's, uh…
-[door closes] -[Ellie] Oh, Jacob.
Now you know why he stayed away so long.
translation.zh: ‎现在你知道他为什么离开这么久了

translation.en: It would be good for him if he could get over it.
translation.zh: ‎能克服这事 对他来说是件好事

translation.en: -[Jacob] Rachel! Rachel, wait! -What?
-Listen. -Yeah?
I know all that stuff in there with my dad probably seemed irrational.
translation.zh: ‎刚才聊到我爸爸 我似乎有点不理智

translation.en: Oh, no, Jake, please. You don't owe me any explanation, okay?
translation.zh: ‎别这样 你不欠我任何解释

translation.en: I'm just some stranger who showed up on your doorstep. You don't owe me anything.
translation.zh:
‎我只是出现在你家门口的陌生人
‎你并不欠我什么

translation.en: You've already helped me, like, a lot. So thank you. And…
translation.zh: ‎你已经帮了我很多 谢谢

translation.en: I really hope you have a lovely… a lovely Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎我真的希望你能过个开心的圣诞节

translation.en: You headed home?
No, I'm going to Cornwall Bridge.
I need to know if I ever mattered to her. Maybe you've wondered that about your dad?
translation.zh:
‎我需要知道她有没有在乎过我
‎也许你也想知道 你爸是否在乎过你

translation.en: Truth is, if I ever saw him, I wouldn't know what to say to him.
translation.zh:
‎如果我见到他
‎都不知道该跟他说什么

translation.en: Well, maybe if you're up for a drive,
translation.zh: ‎好吧 如果你想去兜兜风

translation.en: we could script a few lines.
[Jacob] Come on.
Hop on up.
You're leaving! I guess it's, uh, time to head home?
translation.zh: ‎你要走了 我猜你是要回家？

translation.en: Well, yes and no, actually.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 没错 其实是也不是

translation.en: -How you doing? Jake Turner. Pleasure. -Oh, Ian Page. Pleased to meet you.
translation.zh:
‎-你好吗？杰克·特纳 幸会
‎-伊恩·佩吉 很高兴见到你

translation.en: -I'm a big fan of your work, really. -Oh, thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-我是你作品的忠实粉丝
‎-谢谢

translation.en: I told Ian that you basically wrote my profile.
translation.zh:
‎我跟伊恩说
‎我的个人资料基本是你写的

translation.en: Ah, well, you know, she made me take out all the racy stuff.
translation.zh: ‎她让我把所有猥琐的东西都删掉了

translation.en: [laughs] Well, all's I can say is meeting Eleanor
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我只能说遇到埃莉诺拉

translation.en: is the greatest Christmas surprise I could ask for.
Ian plays first violin with the Hartford Symphony.
translation.zh:
‎伊恩是哈特福德交响乐团的
‎第一小提琴手

translation.en: Is that right? That's impressive. -That's great. -Thanks, mate.
translation.zh:
‎-是吗？真厉害
‎-谢谢你 伙计

translation.en: What did you mean when you said you were leaving, "Yes and no"?
translation.zh:
‎你说要离开
‎“是也不是”是什么意思？

translation.en: Yes, I'm leaving. No, I'm not going home. Uh, Rachel's supposed to be--
translation.zh:
‎是 我是要走
‎不 我不回家 瑞秋打算…

translation.en: -Oh, there she is. Hey. -Hey.
She's convinced me-- And you, uh…
I'm gonna go see my dad.
Jacob.
Good for you.
Well, the universe rewards the brave, right?
You ready for this?
[sighs] Absolutely not. You?
No.
Let's go.
[Jacob] Don't you think Waze would be easier?
Yeah, of course it would. But maps are so much nicer, it's like a…
translation.zh: ‎当然是 ‎但地图更有趣 有种虚拟世界的触觉

translation.en: tactile thing in a virtual world, you know?
translation.zh: ‎但地图更有趣 有种虚拟世界的触觉

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I had this idea… I had this idea for a book about that.
translation.zh:
‎对 我懂
‎我之前本打算把这个想法写成书

translation.en: -A Stephen King thriller-type thing. -Yeah?
translation.zh:
‎-史蒂芬·金那种惊险类型的
‎-嗯？

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, so here's what I came up with. There's this couple, right?
translation.zh:
‎是的 我想到了一个故事 ‎-一对情侣正在度蜜月
‎-好

translation.en: -They're on their honeymoon. -Okay.
And they're in a rental car.
The GPS is, like, possessed or something, or maybe the ex-boyfriend hacked into it.
translation.zh:
‎全球定位系统被附身
‎又或者是被前男友黑掉了

translation.en: That might be better, I'm not sure. Anyway.
translation.zh:
‎那样说可能更好 ‎反正 不管是什么情况
‎全球定位系统把他们引向了致命危险

translation.en: Whatever the case, the GPS leads them into mortal danger.
translation.zh:
‎反正 不管是什么情况
‎全球定位系统把他们引向了致命危险

translation.en: You hate it. Bad? It's bad.
No, no, no! You know, I like it. I like it.
translation.zh: ‎不 你知道的 我喜欢

translation.en: But what happens next? I mean, like, after they're in mortal danger.
translation.zh:
‎但接下来呢？
‎我是说在他们陷入致命危险之后

translation.en: Yeah, I don't-- That's as far as I got. Never wrote it.
translation.zh: ‎我只想到这里 还没动笔

translation.en: -[laughs] All right. -That's it. Well, as my dad said, "No creative idea's ever wasted."
translation.zh:
‎就像我爸说的：
‎“创意的想法永远不会被浪费”

translation.en: -So there you go. -I like that.
[Rachel] Okay, in three miles, take I-91 North. -[Jacob] 91 North. You got it. -Yup.
translation.zh:
‎-好了 五公里后上I-91北
‎-91北路 没问题

translation.en: [Rachel] Alan always gets kind of annoyed when I give him directions.
translation.zh: ‎我给艾伦导航的时候 他总是很烦我

translation.en: -Really? -He says he doesn't need a co-pilot.
translation.zh:
‎-真的吗？
‎-他说他不需要副驾驶

translation.en: I could use any navigational help I can get.
translation.zh: ‎给我什么导航 我都愿意用

translation.en: Speaking of Alan,
what's he think about this, um, this job you applied for in New York?
translation.zh: ‎他怎么看你申请的纽约工作？

translation.en: Um, actually, I, uh…
He doesn't… I haven't told him about it yet.
translation.zh: ‎其实 我…他不… ‎我还没告诉他

translation.en: What's he think about this trip to Cornwall Bridge? Uh, he's not thrilled. He's not thrilled.
translation.zh:
‎-那这次去康沃尔桥怎么样？
‎-他不怎么兴奋

translation.en: And actually he was kind of… peeved.
Yeah. No, let me guess, it's, uh…
He's upset that you are taking a road trip with this guy you just met?
translation.zh:
‎他不高兴是因为
‎你和刚认识的男人一起上路

translation.en: No, actually. No, it was, um…
It was about the… the gas money.
No, it's just like one of those little Alan quirks. [Jacob] Okay.
It's no big deal, and in the grand scheme of things, it's meaningless, right?
translation.zh:
‎没什么大不了的
‎从大的方面来看 这没什么 对吧？

translation.en: I'm kind of insulted. He's not concerned about me, right?
translation.zh: ‎我有点被侮辱了 他竟然不担心我

translation.en: -He's concerned about gas money. -Well, he doesn't know about you.
translation.zh:
‎-他担心的是油钱
‎-他不知道你

translation.en: [Rachel] As it turns out, I didn't really know about you either.
translation.zh: ‎而且事实证明我也不太知道你

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -I finally broke down and I Googled you.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-我终于忍不住用谷歌搜索了你

translation.en: -Oh, come on. -And, honestly, I tried to put it off.
translation.zh: ‎拜托 ‎我试着忍住 我不喜欢搜索别人

translation.en: Because I really don't like looking people up.
translation.zh: ‎我试着忍住 我不喜欢搜索别人

translation.en: It always seems like an intrusion, somehow.
-Uh-huh. -But now… I'm really glad I did.
translation.zh:
‎-但现在 我真的很高兴
‎-才不是

translation.en: -No. -'Cause now I know you're this, like, super-famous, best-selling novelist, so…
translation.zh:
‎因为现在我知道
‎你是超级有名的畅销小说家

translation.en: Uh, super famous is a bit of a stretch, I think.
Well, um, five million copies sold--
It's like five and a half at this point, but it's okay, who's counting?
translation.zh:
‎现在是五百五十万
‎但是有什么所谓呢？

translation.en: And number one on The New York Times Best Seller List.
-I got lucky. -And, uh, translated into 30 languages.
-I think that makes you super famous. -Oh.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得你超级有名 但只是…

translation.en: Here was little old me worried about how you were gonna pay for dinner.
translation.zh:
‎反倒是我这么个小人物
‎竟然担心你付不起晚饭钱

translation.en: Hey, do you mind grabbing my wallet? It's in the backpack in the back there.
translation.zh:
‎你能帮我拿下钱包吗？
‎在后座的背包里

translation.en: -Thank you very much. -Mmm-hmm.
-[grunts] -Jake, do you know what this is?
No. You know what? I just, uh… That was in a box marked "personal" at my mom's.
translation.zh:
‎你知道吗？这是在我妈妈
‎一个写着“私人”的盒子里找到的

translation.en: I just kinda picked it up, and I didn't look at it. What is it?
translation.zh: ‎我只是收起来都没看 怎么了？

translation.en: [voice breaking] Okay, listen to this.
"My name is Noel Ellis."
"I'm 17 years old, and I'm having a baby."
translation.zh: ‎“我17岁 即将生下一个孩子”

translation.en: This is my mother's diary.
I know it. I know it.
Her name is Noel. I can't believe this.
translation.zh: ‎她叫诺埃尔 真不敢相信

translation.en: [laughing incredulously] I can't-- I just-- I can't--
"My parents sent me away to have my baby."
"They're ashamed of me."
[Noel] And they're ashamed of the child I'm bringing into this world.
translation.zh:
‎他们为我带到这个世界的孩子
‎感到羞耻

translation.en: And so, I'm leaving.
"They truly believe it's wrong for a woman to have a child outside of marriage."
translation.zh:
‎“他们真心认为
‎女人没结婚就生孩子是错误的”

translation.en: "'God disapproves,' they say."
[Noel] But doesn't God forgive our mistakes?
translation.zh: ‎但上帝不是会原谅我们的错误吗？

translation.en: Everyone I know and trust has abandoned me.
translation.zh: ‎我认识和信任的所有人都抛弃了我

translation.en: "Thankfully, this really kind family hired me as their nanny."
translation.zh: ‎“幸好有户好人家雇了我做保姆”

translation.en: [Noel] The Turners are a family of four.
[Rachel] "Scott and Lois and their little boys, Benjamin and Jacob."
translation.zh:
‎“斯科特和洛伊斯和他们的儿子们
‎本杰明和雅各布”

translation.en: [Noel] Benji's seven and has loads of energy.
Jake is four, and he's the quiet one.
translation.zh: ‎杰克四岁 他是安静的那个

translation.en: Do you have any memory of that? I know you were little, but…
translation.zh: ‎你记得吗？我知道你当时很小 但…

translation.en: I really don't.
[Noel] He likes me to read the Magic Tree House books to him.
translation.zh: ‎他喜欢我给他读《魔法树屋》的书

translation.en: So where's Ben now?
Oh, there was this, um, snowstorm. It was around Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎有一年暴风雪来临 在圣诞节附近

translation.en: We had… We had this giant elm tree in our front yard.
translation.zh: ‎我们家前面院子里有棵大榆树

translation.en: Benji loved to climb and he was in that tree all the time.
translation.zh: ‎本杰明喜欢爬树 他一直在那棵树上

translation.en: And that night, Ben decided he was gonna climb as high as he could in that tree.
translation.zh:
‎那天晚上 本决定爬上那棵树
‎越高越好…

translation.en: [Rachel] ♪ Don't know why ♪
♪ There's no sun up in the sky Stormy weather… ♪
translation.zh: ‎天上没有太阳 暴风雨天气…

translation.en: Sorry about earlier, I got so emotional talking about my brother.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 说到哥哥 我有点情绪化

translation.en: No, it's… You don't need to apologize. I understand.
translation.zh: ‎没事 你不需要道歉 我懂

translation.en: Thanks.
It's been over 30 years, you know? You'd think I'd be able to… talk about it.
translation.zh:
‎已经过去30多年了
‎我还以为能说出来

translation.en: You know that saying, "Time heals all wounds"?
translation.zh: ‎你听说过“时间会治愈一切伤口”吗？

translation.en: It doesn't.
[Noel] It's been two months now,
and I still haven't heard a word from either of my parents or Peter.
translation.zh:
‎我还是没有收到
‎父母或彼得的只言片语

translation.en: [Rachel] "One day in my room, I just couldn't stop crying…"
translation.zh:
‎“有一天 在房间里
‎我忍不住哭了出来…”

translation.en: [both] And there was this quiet knock on the door.
[Rachel] "And little Jacob came in."
[Noel] He laid his head on my shoulder, and it was as if he understood.
translation.zh:
‎他把头放在我的肩膀上
‎仿佛他能理解我

translation.en: I love that kid more and more every day.
I know you're not supposed to have favorites, but…
[waitress] One New York, rare,
translation.zh: ‎一份纽约式牛排 一分熟

translation.en: and one vegetarian plate, no peppers, no carrots, no onions, sauce on the side.
translation.zh:
‎还有一份蔬菜沙拉 ‎不要辣椒 胡萝卜 洋葱
‎酱汁放在旁边

translation.en: Thank you. Perfect.
-Hey, can I ask you a question? -Can I stop you?
translation.zh:
‎-我能问你一个问题吗？
‎-我能不让吗？

translation.en: -No. -[chuckles]
Why is it that a handsome, successful guy like you is still single?
translation.zh:
‎为什么像你这样的帅气成功的男人
‎还是个单身？

translation.en: -Handsome? -Don't deflect.
-I like to be alone, I guess, you know? -Hmm. Safer that way. I get it.
translation.zh:
‎我估计是因为喜欢一个人吧
‎你懂吗？ ‎这样更安全 我懂

translation.en: But you're engaged.
Still, there's always that, like, push-pull thing, you know?
translation.zh: ‎但还是有拉扯的感觉 你懂吗？

translation.en: -Mmm. -"Come closer."
-"I want to be alone." You know? -[chuckles] Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: ‎“我想一个人待着” 你知道吗？

translation.en: I mean, I've had relationships in the past, don't get me wrong.
translation.zh: ‎我以前谈过恋爱 别误会

translation.en: I've had serious relationships in the past, a few of them anyway, but…
translation.zh: ‎我有过很认真的感情 有几段

translation.en: You know, in the end, they all just, uh…
In the end, I just wasn't what they were looking for, you know?
translation.zh:
‎最后 我都不是她们要找的人
‎你懂吗？

translation.en: Maybe they weren't what you were looking for.
translation.zh: ‎也许是因为她们不是你要找的人

translation.en: Uh, question. What are the odds of us making it through the pass before the storm hits?
translation.zh:
‎今晚暴风雪前
‎我们通行的概率有多大？

translation.en: -Tonight? -Yeah.
Ooh, I'd say about…
zero.
-[Jacob] Percent? -Percent.
Why don't you check us in? I think Ava needs to stretch her legs.
translation.zh:
‎要不你去登记房间？
‎我觉得艾娃需要伸展一下腿部

translation.en: -Sure! Meet you back here in 20? -Yeah.
All right.
[Rachel] Hey! [Alan] Hey, stranger.
Look, I, uh, I wanted to apologize for the other night.
translation.zh: ‎听着 我想为那晚的事道歉

translation.en: I know this stuff with your mom, trying to find her--
No, no, no, Alan. Don't worry. Don't worry. It's fine.
translation.zh: ‎不 艾伦 没事 没关系

translation.en: Uh, so, listen, on a forward-thinking note,
translation.zh: ‎听着 我有一个前瞻性的想法

translation.en: I had an idea for our engagement party.
translation.zh: ‎是关于我们订婚派对的想法

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah?
Yeah, you know that Mexican restaurant you love, Casa Frida?
translation.zh:
‎那家你喜欢的墨西哥餐厅
‎弗里达之家？

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -So it's available Valentine's Day,
which is perfect for an engagement party, right?
translation.zh: ‎用来办订婚派对完美了 是不是？

translation.en: Plus, they are giving us a phenomenal price.
translation.zh: ‎而且 他们给了我们超低价格

translation.en: Oh, that sounds great.
Yeah? So my plan is give them a deposit first thing tomorrow morning.
translation.zh:
‎嗯？所以 我的计划是
‎明天一大早就去交定金

translation.en: Alan, can we just…
Can we just wait on Casa Frida?
translation.zh: ‎弗里达之家的事能等一下嘛？

translation.en: Till I get back.
Of course, babe. Yeah. Whatever you want.
translation.zh: ‎当然可以 宝贝 好 随便你

translation.en: -When are you back? -Soon.
Okay. Love you.
I love you too.
You're in luck! Got two rooms left. Great! Terrific.
translation.zh:
‎-你真幸运 还剩两间房
‎-很好 好极了

translation.en: You know, if this were a rom-com, you'd have one room left.
translation.zh: ‎如果这是甜剧 你应该只剩一个房间

translation.en: We'd have to share it.
Rom-com?
Romantic comedy, rom-com.
-Oh, right! -Yeah.
Well, if it helps,
the rooms are connected.
Okay, I'm sorry, you're closing.
I was gonna head to the pageant, but it can wait. How can I help?
translation.zh:
‎我本来要去看演出
‎有什么能帮到你的吗？

translation.en: I was wondering if you had any books by Jacob Turner?
[chuckles] Of course! How far along are you in the series?
translation.zh: ‎当然有 他的系列你看到哪里了？

translation.en: Uh… I'm at the beginning, so I don't know.
translation.zh: ‎我才开始看 所以不知道

translation.en: Okay! You want Book One, Green Eyes of Paris. We should have that.
translation.zh:
‎你要的是第一本书《巴黎绿眼》
‎我们应该有

translation.en: Great! So what's it about?
Paris in the '40s.
The French Resistance, espionage, forbidden love.
translation.zh: ‎法国抵抗运动 间谍 禁忌之爱

translation.en: Oh, wow. Sounds pretty--
Riveting, right? And trust me, it is.
translation.zh: ‎吸引人对吧？相信我 真的如此

translation.en: The world this guy creates,
it's like you're actually there with his characters.
translation.zh: ‎会让你觉得和那些角色同在

translation.en: It's what makes the book so absorbing.
That's probably why I have such a hard time keeping them on the shelves.
translation.zh: ‎所以才很难保证货架上一直有这本书

translation.en: Ah! Look at that, you're in luck.
Thanks.
Not bad.
Yeah, and he writes almost as good as he looks.
translation.zh: ‎没错 他写的东西和长相一样好

translation.en: -[Jacob] Hey. -Hey.
So, what do you think? Should we call it a night, or…
translation.zh:
‎你觉得怎么样？
‎我们今晚到此为止还是…？

translation.en: "Or." Definitely "or."
Yeah! Yeah, yeah, come on.
Merry Christmas!
-There you are. -[customer] Thank you.
-[Jacob] Look at this. -Look at this! Hi! So cute.
translation.zh:
‎-看看这个
‎-看看这个 嗨！好可爱

translation.en: [Jacob] You better knock it off. She'll get jealous.
translation.zh: ‎最好别这样 它会吃醋的

translation.en: -[Jacob] Incredible. -[Rachel] I love it here.
-How are you? -Hi!
-Do you mind if we have… -[vendor] Absolutely.
-Thank you! You're giving these away? -[vendor] On the house.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢 这些是送的吗？
‎-免费

translation.en: -Thank you! -It's my favorite town.
-[Jacob] Smells great. -Happy holidays.
Oh, wow, look at that! I haven't seen this film in years.
translation.zh:
‎哇 看那个
‎我好多年没看过这电影了

translation.en: -[Rachel] I've never seen it. -You're kidding. You're in for a treat.
translation.zh:
‎-我没看过
‎-开玩笑吧 你赚到了

translation.en: Excuse me, are you two together?
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 你们两个一起的吗？

translation.en: Oh, no.
Yeah? Well, yeah. We were, you know--
Maybe we are.
-Smooth. -[Rachel laughing]
You okay?
I'm shakin' the dust of this crummy little town off my feet
translation.zh:
‎我要离开这个寒酸的小镇
‎抖落脚上的尘土

translation.en: and I'm gonna see the world! -Italy, Greece… -[inaudible]
translation.zh: ‎去见识世界 意大利 希腊…

translation.en: [Rachel] Wow! That may be the best movie I've ever seen.
translation.zh: ‎哇！这可能是我看过最好的电影

translation.en: [Jacob] He wondered if this journey was about to take an unexpected turn.
translation.zh:
‎他在想这趟旅程
‎会不会有意想不到的转折

translation.en: [Rachel gasps] Oh, my God. No way.
Everything okay in there?
-Hi. -Hi.
Yeah, I'm fine.
Great.
-I just-- I heard-- I thought I heard a-- -Oh, yeah, no.
translation.zh:
‎-我听到…我以为听到…
‎-好吧 没事

translation.en: [laughs] Thanks for checking, though. Appreciate it.
[nervously] Okay. Just, uh-- Well, just have a--
-[Rachel] Good night. -Good night.
[Jacob] How'd you sleep?
[laughs] Actually, I was up last night reading.
-Anything interesting? -Uh, yeah, very.
translation.zh:
‎-有趣的内容？
‎-对 非常有趣

translation.en: -Yeah? -Green Eyes of Paris.
-You know that one? [laughing] -I've heard of it. You…
[laughs] You bought my book and you didn't tell me? Yeah, well, I didn't…
translation.zh:
‎-你买了我的书却没告诉我？
‎-我没…

translation.en: -I didn't wanna tell you just in case-- -Just in case what?
translation.zh:
‎-我没想告诉你 以防…
‎-以防什么？

translation.en: In case I didn't like it.
-In case you didn't like it? -Yeah.
And?
Well…
No, it's okay. You can tell me. It's fine. My ego is, uh…
translation.zh: ‎没关系 你可以告诉我 我的自尊…

translation.en: I think I can handle it.
-What's up? What did you think? -Okay, well, um…
-You know, I find it interesting… -Yeah.
…that you write these novels filled with suspense, and drama, romance,
translation.zh:
‎你写的小说
‎充满了悬念和戏剧性 很浪漫

translation.en: and yet your main character, Henri,
he never lets anyone get close to him.
translation.zh: ‎却不会轻易让身旁的人接近自己

translation.en: It's kinda like what we were talking about last night.
Henri lives in occupied France, right? He can't trust anybody.
translation.zh:
‎亨利生活在被占领的法国 对吧？
‎他不能相信任何人

translation.en: Well, yeah, but…
This isn't occupied America. So what's your excuse?
translation.zh:
‎这里不是被占领的美国
‎那你的借口是什么？

translation.en: On the other hand…
-I really loved the book. -Yeah?
I loved it! It was just…
God, the ending?
It kind of blew me away.
Good. Good, good, good.
The endings are, uh… ending, it's… They're always hard to get right, you know. Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎结局总是很难写好 你懂吧

translation.en: Any thoughts on the current story? You gonna get that ending right?
translation.zh:
‎你对目前的故事有什么想法吗？
‎你会写个好结局吧？

translation.en: [Noel] I found out today I'm having a girl,
translation.zh: ‎我今天发现自己怀的是个女孩

translation.en: a sweet, little baby girl.
Before I left home, my parents told me not to name my baby.
translation.zh:
‎在我离家之前
‎爸妈告诉我不要给孩子取名

translation.en: "Because it would only make it harder to say goodbye."
translation.zh: ‎“因为这样 只会让道别变得更难”

translation.en: "But I've already… given her a name."
[Noel] My angel.
Um, can you pull over? I… I need… I need some air.
translation.zh: ‎你能停一下吗？我需要透透气

translation.en: -You sure? It's freezing outside. -Yeah, please.
[Jacob] Okay. Sure.
Hey. Come on.
Ah! It's freezing out here. Here you go.
You all right?
[voice breaking] Why would she leave it behind?
Why go through the trouble of writing everything down
and documenting all these details if she wasn't…
translation.zh: ‎记录下所有的细节 而她又不…

translation.en: if she was just gonna abandon it?
translation.zh: ‎而她又要放弃的原因是什么呢？

translation.en: I don't know. You know, maybe she thought it would find its way back to you, eventually?
translation.zh:
‎我不知道
‎也许是她觉得最终会被你发现？

translation.en: Or maybe she just wanted to forget everything.
Like it never existed.
-Like I never existed. -[quietly] No.
translation.zh:
‎-好像我从不存在一样
‎-不是的

translation.en: I'm supposed to be engaged. I'm supposed to be getting married.
translation.zh: ‎我要订婚了 我要结婚了

translation.en: -[Jacob] Oh, no! What are you-- No, wait! -[barking continues]
-Come on! where are you-- No! -Ava? Ava!
-[barking continues] -[Jacob] Ava!
Ava, no!
[whistling loudly] Ava Turner, get back here right now!
-What were you gonna do if you caught it? -Yeah.
[laughs] That was incredible.
Guess life's all about the chase, huh, Turner?
translation.zh: ‎看来人生就是为了追逐 对吧 特纳？

translation.en: -[Jacob] I think we took a wrong turn. -[Rachel laughs]
-You mean you hope we took a wrong turn? -Exactly.
translation.zh:
‎-你是说 希望我们走错路了？
‎-没错

translation.en: Please tell me the universe really does reward the brave.
translation.zh: ‎拜托 请告诉我 皇天不负勇敢者

translation.en: You got this.
[sighs] Here we go.
[Jacob] It was a day he had both been anticipating…
and dreading.
Jacob.
You know, Eleanor called to say you might be coming.
translation.zh: ‎埃莉诺打电话说你可能会来

translation.en: I told her I didn't believe it,
but she said over and over again, "Just be prepared."
Are you?
Yeah! I… I'm cutting down this Christmas tree for you.
translation.zh: ‎对 我为你砍了棵圣诞树

translation.en: I've only been waiting for this moment for 30-odd years, and now that it's here…
translation.zh:
‎我等这一刻已经等了30多年
‎现在终于来了…

translation.en: Yeah. Same.
Mind giving me a hand?
Plus, if it's just you, what's the point, right?
translation.zh:
‎而且 如果只有自己
‎那又有什么意义呢？

translation.en: [Jacob] Yeah, well, if it's any consolation, I've never had a tree,
translation.zh:
‎对 好吧 如果能安慰到你的话
‎我还从没拥有过一棵树

translation.en: so you're ahead of me.
[Scott] All right. Welcome to my humble abode.
Here we go.
-Now just set this end down here. -Yeah.
[Scott] Can you tip it up?
-Gotta get the stand. -[Jacob] All right.
-You live out here all alone? -I do!
-All right. -[Jacob] Ellie painted that, right?
translation.zh:
‎-好吧
‎-那是埃莉画的 对吧？

translation.en: Good eye. Yeah, that's hers.
translation.zh: ‎好眼神 对 那是她画的

translation.en: All right.
-I think that should do it. -[Jacob] Yeah?
-Look at that. -[Scott] Good job.
-[phone ringing] -[Scott] Oh. Excuse me.
[in background] Scott Turner. Hello?
Yes.
[Scott] See you then.
[grunts] Sorry about that.
That was, uh, one of my clients.
-Your clients? What do you do? -I'm a social worker at the VA.
translation.zh:
‎-你的委托人？你在做什么？
‎-我是退伍军人协会的社工

translation.en: Social, you're trying to do some good in the world?
translation.zh: ‎你想在这世上试着做点好事？

translation.en: Underline "trying."
You know, I bought these forever ago when I first moved in,
translation.zh:
‎我搬进来的时候买了这些
‎已经过了好久

translation.en: and I never even took them out of the box.
translation.zh: ‎甚至从没把它们从盒子里拿出来过

translation.en: Think they still work?
I don't know.
Jake…
I know an apology doesn't mean a whole lot after all these years… You know what? It's…
translation.zh:
‎-我知道道歉没什么意义…
‎-你知道吗？

translation.en: You can save it.
I didn't come out here for a, uh, you know, reconciliation.
I'm only here to help a friend, honestly.
translation.zh: ‎老实说 我只是来帮朋友

translation.en: -A friend? -Yeah, a friend. It's a long story.
translation.zh:
‎-朋友？
‎-对 朋友 说来话长

translation.en: Well, since you're here, can I at least say what I've been waiting--
translation.zh:
‎既然你来了
‎能让我至少讲些一直想说的话吗…

translation.en: I'd, I'd… I'd really rather you didn't.
I am sorry.
[mutters] You're sorry.
I am deeply, deeply sorry.
Yeah. Good. Good. So we're all set then.
translation.zh: ‎对 很好 我们都准备好一吐为快了

translation.en: You know, um, you left me alone with Mom,
and then you run up here, and you just disappear altogether…
translation.zh: ‎然后跑到这里 就这么消失

translation.en: [shouts] And you're sorry?
God! I said I wasn't gonna do this.
Uh, you know what? This was a mistake. I can't do this.
translation.zh: ‎你知道吗？这是个错误 我做不到

translation.en: -Jake! -Enjoy your tree.
-Hey! -No, I can't handle this.
translation.zh: ‎我应付不来 我还以为这是个好主意

translation.en: -I thought this was a good idea. Let's go. -What?
translation.zh:
‎我应付不来 我还以为这是个好主意 ‎-走吧
‎-等等 深呼吸一下 好吗？

translation.en: Wait, just take a breath, okay? Take a breath.
translation.zh:
‎-走吧
‎-等等 深呼吸一下 好吗？

translation.en: You know, if you walk away now, that's it, right?
translation.zh:
‎如果你现在走开
‎事情就这样了 对吗？

translation.en: It's over. Forever.
-Well, it's been over for 35 years-- -Stop! Jake.
If you leave now,
you are doing exactly what he did.
translation.zh: ‎就是在做和他当年一样的事情

translation.en: Right?
Why don't you just try being the first adult in your family not to take the exit?
translation.zh:
‎你为什么不试着成为
‎家里第一个不逃跑的大人？

translation.en: Please.
[Scott] Jake, it's just so hard to talk about…
but two days before Christmas,
we had the biggest snowstorm of the winter.
translation.zh: ‎我们遇到了冬季最大的暴风雪

translation.en: And Benji, like every year,
couldn't wait to hang his favorite ornament
translation.zh: ‎等不及去把他最喜欢的装饰物

translation.en: high up in the branches of our old elm tree.
translation.zh: ‎高高地挂到老榆树的树枝上

translation.en: He'd climbed up so many times to that platform that I'd built for you guys.
translation.zh:
‎他爬过很多次
‎那个平台是我给你们做的

translation.en: [Scott] I knew the branches could be slippery…
but he was such a determined little guy.
I thought, "I'll just let him hang the ornament."
translation.zh: ‎我心想：“就让他去挂那个装饰物吧”

translation.en: [Scott] The sound of that branch cracking will never leave me.
translation.zh: ‎我永远忘不掉那根树枝断裂的声音

translation.en: I was Benji's father.
I should have stopped him.
The following April,
I cut down that tree.
It didn't help at all.
And after Noel left,
your mom and I just…
couldn't comfort each other anymore.
And it got to the point where one of us had to leave.
translation.zh: ‎于是发展到我们中必须有一个人离开

translation.en: I wanted to take you with me,
but I just couldn't do that to her.
You were all she had left.
[sighs] I told myself that with you there,
somehow she'd find her way back.
You know, you used to love stringing the lights when you were little.
You remember?
[Rachel] So, tell me, be honest,
do you think we should go in or just let them be?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得我们应该进去
‎还是就这么随他们去？

translation.en: Okay, I guess we'll let them be. Okay. I heard you.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我猜是就这么随他们去
‎好 我听到了

translation.en: You know, I tried to stay in touch.
At first, I called. Left messages for you. For years, I wrote letters to you.
translation.zh:
‎一开始我打电话 给你留信息
‎连着给你写了好几年的信

translation.en: I've never seen a letter or a message. Mom never told me.
translation.zh:
‎我从没见过那些信或讯息
‎妈妈从没告诉过我

translation.en: -So are you married? -[laughs] Married? No, I'm not. No.
translation.zh:
‎-你结婚了？
‎-结婚？没有 我没有 没有

translation.en: I read your first couple of books.
But my eyesight's not what it was, so I listened to the third one on audio.
translation.zh:
‎我的视力不如以前
‎所以第三本我听的是有声书

translation.en: I mean, it's the first time I got to hear your adult voice.
translation.zh: ‎那是我第一次听到你成年后的声音

translation.en: It was fantastic.
I love 'em.
[Jacob] Oh, I remember.
I think Benji called you a butterfingers…
That's beautiful.
Here's hoping.
-There you go. -[Scott chuckles]
-Success! -[whines]
Didn't you say you came here to help a friend?
translation.zh: ‎你不是说来这里是为了帮朋友吗？

translation.en: [Scott] Hey. How's the weather?
It's chili!
Here it comes.
-Excuse me, girl. This is not for you. -[Rachel laughs]
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 宝贝 这不是给你的

translation.en: Noel was a godsend.
After we lost Jacob's brother,
she was the glue that kept us from completely coming apart.
translation.zh: ‎她是让我们没有彻底决裂的胶水

translation.en: -Here you go. -Oh, thank you.
Now, bear with me. I've been making this chili for myself for 35 years,
translation.zh:
‎忍耐一下
‎我已经为自己做了35年辣椒

translation.en: so I have no idea if it's safe for public consumption.
translation.zh: ‎所以我不知道别人尝起来会怎么样

translation.en: -Smells good. I'll tell you that. -All right, son, here you go.
translation.zh:
‎-闻起来不错 这点可以确定
‎-好了 儿子 给你

translation.en: Oh, it's more than safe. It's really good. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎不只是还行 真的很好吃 谢谢

translation.en: -[Jacob] Mmm. That's great. -[Rachel] It's really great.
Fantastic.
So would you happen to know
where Noel moved or where she might live now?
translation.zh:
‎诺埃尔搬去哪里
‎或者现在可能住在哪里吗？

translation.en: You know, she sent me something years ago. Hold on.
translation.zh: ‎她几年前给我寄过东西 等等

translation.en: -[Rachel] Really? -[Scott] Excuse me, baby.
[whispering] What do you think?
Um, you have his eyes.
Really?
Yeah.
It's a good thing.
Well…
-[Scott] I, uh… Sorry. -[Ava whines]
I always held on to this. Don't ask me why.
translation.zh: ‎我一直留着这个 别问我为什么

translation.en: It says she's gonna be living with her husband, Charles Hayden, in Ridgefield.
translation.zh: ‎信上说她和丈夫 ‎查尔斯·海登住在里奇菲尔德

translation.en: Noel Hayden.
I gotta say it. You two would make a fantastic couple.
translation.zh: ‎必须得说 你们俩真的非常般配

translation.en: -No, no, Rachel's engaged. -Yeah.
-Really? -Yeah, big time.
-Congratulations. -Thank you.
He must be a great guy because you are one heck of a catch.
translation.zh: ‎对方肯定是个好人 因为你太棒了

translation.en: -That she is. -Okay. [laughs]
So, you'll let me know how everything turns out?
translation.zh:
‎所以 你回头会告诉我
‎事情进展如何吧？

translation.en: Oh, of course. Of course. Thank you. Thank you so much.
You're welcome, sweetheart.
Wish me luck.
-Best of luck. -Thanks.
I, uh…
-Thanks for wearing that watch, son. -Oh.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你戴着那块手表 儿子

translation.en: I can't tell you how much that means to me.
Yeah, come on. Come on.
You grew up good. Real good.
Well, um, stay in touch.
-A hundred percent. -Okay.
[Rachel] You okay?
Yeah. Yeah, I'm okay. Thank you.
Yeah.
[Noel] Today, my sweet baby girl was born.
translation.zh: ‎今天 我的宝贝女儿出生了

translation.en: And I know I will never see her again.
translation.zh: ‎我知道自己再也见不到她了

translation.en: "So I'm gonna leave this diary behind."
"Maybe someday she'll read it and understand how much I love her."
translation.zh:
‎“也许有一天她会读到
‎知道我有多爱她”

translation.en: [Noel crying] And always will.
"And always will."
God, I hope that's true… [sniffles]
…what she said about loving me.
[Rachel] So I was thinking about Noel.
Should I call her first, or do you think I should just show up tomorrow?
translation.zh:
‎我应该先打给她
‎还是明天就那么出现？

translation.en: -What do you… what do you think? -Hmm.
I think get some sleep and decide in the morning.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得应该睡一觉 明早再决定

translation.en: Yeah.
[chuckles] Like I'm gonna sleep.
[clerk] Um, let me just triple check to make sure.
Oh, gosh, I'm sorry, but we only have one room available.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 抱歉 我们只剩一间房了

translation.en: -Oh, no, uh… -We'll take it.
We'll take it?
Yeah, we'll…
-You know, we'll take it. -[clerk laughs] Great.
Thank you.
[Rachel] So…
I have a confession to make.
-Confession? -Yep.
Uh-oh! What'd she do?
Today is my birthday.
-No! -Yeah.
-Today's your birthday? -Yeah.
You're kidding. You're just now telling me this? This is…
translation.zh: ‎你开玩笑吧 到现在才告诉我？

translation.en: -What? You should have said something. -Yeah.
This is a big deal. You should've said something.
translation.zh: ‎这是件大事 你应该提前说

translation.en: You know, you, uh, we can-- You know, it's a birthday. These are--
translation.zh:
‎你知道 我们可以…
‎这可是生日 这些是…

translation.en: -[chuckling] What are you doing? -We're gonna celebrate your birthday!
translation.zh:
‎-你在做什么？
‎-我们要给你庆祝生日

translation.en: Hi! This is Jake Turner from the Amber Suite.
translation.zh: ‎你好 这位是安珀套房的杰克·特纳

translation.en: I was wondering if--
Yeah, that Jake Turner. I-- Thank you. I appreciate it.
translation.zh:
‎对 是那位杰克·特纳 我…
‎谢谢你 很感激

translation.en: Listen, I was wondering if you could do me a favor?
[voice fading] I've got a birthday girl up here. I just found out.
translation.zh:
‎我这里有个女孩过生日
‎我刚刚才知道

translation.en: I know it's late notice, but do you have a birthday cake
translation.zh:
‎我知道是有点迟
‎但你那里有蛋糕什么的

translation.en: or something, a dessert you can put candles in?
[Jacob] You do? Terrific.
Uh, you know what? Yes, more red wine.
And you might as well send up some champagne too
because it's a birthday, champagne is for celebrating.
translation.zh: ‎因为是生日 香槟是用来庆生的

translation.en: Wonderful. Thank you very much.
-You wanna dance? -Really?
Yeah.
-Really? -Yeah, come on. It's my birthday.
translation.zh:
‎-真的吗？
‎-对 来吧 今天是我的生日

translation.en: It's your birthday. You're right. Okay.
translation.zh: ‎今天是你的生日 你说得对 好

translation.en: Happy birthday, Rachel.
Make a wish.
Way ahead of you.
[Rachel] Dear Jake.
First of all, I want you to know that last night was beautiful.
translation.zh: ‎首先我想让你知道 昨晚很美好

translation.en: And I'd be lying if I didn't admit
that I've been thinking about it since the moment we met.
translation.zh:
‎和你相遇开始
‎我就一直在想着这件事

translation.en: But I woke up in the middle of the night feeling confused.
translation.zh: ‎但是当我午夜醒来的时候 我困惑了

translation.en: Really, really confused.
And the thing is Alan really loves me,
and that's not nothing.
And you have a very different life
with best-selling books, and a million Instagram followers,
translation.zh: ‎你有畅销书和一百万社交网络粉丝

translation.en: and I'm… just getting launched,
which I totally understand, at least to the extent that I can.
translation.zh:
‎我完全可以理解
‎至少在我能理解的范围内

translation.en: It's just that I'm a person who needs a lot of certainty in their life.
translation.zh: ‎只是我是一个需要很多确定性的人

translation.en: And this time with you, wonderful though it was,
translation.zh: ‎这次能和你一起 尽管很奇妙

translation.en: it isn't that.
So I think it's better that we part company now
translation.zh: ‎所以我觉得我们应该早点分开

translation.en: before it's too late,
at least for me.
And I realized something else,
translation.zh: ‎多亏了你 我意识到另一件事

translation.en: My whole life, I thought my mother didn't want me
translation.zh: ‎我一辈子都以为妈妈不要我了

translation.en: and that I needed to find her and ask her why.
translation.zh: ‎我要找到她 问清楚原因

translation.en: But now that I've read her diary, I know that she did truly love me,
translation.zh:
‎但现在读了她的日记
‎我知道她真的爱我

translation.en: and that's all that really matters.
Thank you for everything,
for going on this wild, life-changing ride with me.
translation.zh:
‎陪我踏上这段任性
‎却改变了人生的旅途

translation.en: I'll never, ever forget it.
And, lastly,
I'll never, ever forget you.
-Pardon me, the, uh, nurses' station? -Um, down the hall, to the right.
translation.zh:
‎-抱歉 护士站怎么走？
‎-沿着走廊 往右走

translation.en: -To the right. Thank you. -Welcome.
Excuse me. Hi, can you tell me where to find Noel Hayden?
translation.zh:
‎不好意思 嗨
‎请问哪里能找到诺埃尔·海登？

translation.en: Hi, I'm Noel.
I called your house, your husband told me where to find you.
translation.zh: ‎是你丈夫告诉我该在哪里找你

translation.en: I don't know if you remember me or not, but, um…
I'm Jacob Turner.
Jacob?
Wow.
How are your folks?
Uh, my folks? My, um…
My mom just recently passed away.
-I'm so sorry. -Thank you. Yeah, it was very sudden.
translation.zh:
‎-对不起
‎-谢谢 事情太突然了

translation.en: -But your dad, he's-- -He's good. He's, um…
translation.zh:
‎-但你爸爸 他…?
‎-他很好 他…

translation.en: Yeah, I just saw him for the first time in a really long time, actually.
translation.zh: ‎我过了很久才第一次见到他

translation.en: He's… He's good. He's hanging in.
Like the rest of us.
Like the rest of us, yeah.
You gotta be wondering why I'm here after all these years.
translation.zh:
‎你一定想知道
‎我为什么在这么多年后来到这里

translation.en: It's a really long, complicated story, but…
translation.zh: ‎这是一个很漫长复杂的故事

translation.en: Noel, when my brother died,
translation.zh: ‎但是 诺埃尔 我哥哥去世的时候

translation.en: I didn't realize until just recently how much you helped my family, how much you helped me.
translation.zh:
‎我并没有意识到你帮了我家那么多
‎直到最近才知道

translation.en: -You were just a little kid, Jake. -But if you hadn't been there--
translation.zh:
‎-你当时只是个小孩子
‎-但如果你不在…

translation.en: But I was.
And you got through it.
Now that I'm here, I can say thank you.
translation.zh: ‎现在我来了 终于可以向你道谢了

translation.en: Now that you're here,
you're welcome.
There's one other thing I wanted to talk to you about before I left, um…
translation.zh: ‎在我离开前 还有一件事想跟你说

translation.en: The child that you had, your daughter.
Rachel.
She's…
wonderful, she's amazing.
I wanted you to know that.
You know her?
I do know her, um…
Yeah, she wanted to come here, she wanted to meet you in person.
And I think, you know, after… after reading this…
she felt a connection for sure, and, uh…
she understands everything. Everything.
[voice breaks] Thank you for telling me that.
Merry Christmas.
Merry Christmas, Jacob.
And thank you for this.
It's a precious gift.
And, Jake…
if you see my daughter,
would you tell her that if she ever wants to get in touch,
translation.zh: ‎你能告诉她 如果她想联系我

translation.en: I would like that very much.
Rachel.
[woman] Your dad's been working on this since Thanksgiving.
translation.zh: ‎你爸从感恩节开始就忙着做这个

translation.en: I can't wait to see it.
I think it's the most beautiful he's ever done.
translation.zh: ‎我想这是我见过的他最好的作品了

translation.en: -[Rachel exclaims] Yeah? -[phone vibrating]
Uh, when will Alan be coming?
Uh, soon. Soon.
-You don't sound too excited, honey. -Well, I am, I just…
translation.zh:
‎-你听起来不太兴奋 亲爱的
‎-我不知道 我只是…

translation.en: I don't know, "excited" is a bit… a strong word.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 “兴奋”这个词有点言重了

translation.en: [man] I couldn't get it right until finally last night at, like, 2:00 a.m.
translation.zh: ‎我一直做到昨晚夜里2点才终于完成

translation.en: No, you got it right, Dad. This is… It's perfect.
translation.zh:
‎不 你做得太好了 爸爸
‎这是…太完美了

translation.en: I love it. This is… It's perfect. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢它 好完美 谢谢

translation.en: Honey, you don't want to talk to Alan?
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 你不想和艾伦谈谈吗？

translation.en: No, no, it's not that. It's just that I don't, um…
translation.zh: ‎不 不是那样的 只是 我…

translation.en: I don't know. Things are… We'll talk later, and it's…
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 事情…我们回头再说

translation.en: We're sorting things… sorting some things out right now.
"Sorting some things out"? I thought you guys made up.
translation.zh: ‎“解决一些事情”？我以为你们和好了

translation.en: No, we-- We did, we just--
You know, things are a little up in the air right now.
This is starting to sound a little like that cigar engagement ring.
translation.zh: ‎听起来有点像那枚雪茄订婚戒指

translation.en: -Dad, stop. Seriously. -[phone vibrating]
Um, sorry, guys, one sec. I'll be right back.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 稍等一下 马上回来

translation.en: Jake, you've gotta stop calling. No, I'm not gonna stop calling until we talk.
translation.zh:
‎-杰克 别再打电话了
‎-不说清楚 我不会停止的

translation.en: [Rachel] I don't want to do this. Okay? I…
So I'm gonna just hang up the phone now.
Please don't try to find me, okay?
Too late.
Why are you doing this?
Do you really have to ask?
I'm not coming out.
I'm not. I can't.
Why? Why not? What are you… What are you afraid of? What's gonna happen?
translation.zh:
‎为什么？为什么不？你怕什么？
‎接下来会怎样？

translation.en: Jake, you don't understand.
You don't. I have finally found something… that I can really…
translation.zh: ‎你不懂 我终于找到真正可以…

translation.en: I can really count on, and…
It may not be perfect, but it's what I want.
translation.zh: ‎也许不完美 但那就是我要的

translation.en: It's what I need.
So I need you to understand that.
I do understand. I understand the whole thing.
I understand that…
what you may have needed before, you don't need anymore.
translation.zh: ‎你已经不需要以前需要的东西了

translation.en: Look at me, I… All I wanted my entire life was to be alone.
translation.zh: ‎看看我 我一辈子都只想孤身一人

translation.en: And it's hard for people like us to trust, right? To let people in.
translation.zh:
‎我们这种人很难相信别人对吧？
‎让别人靠近

translation.en: It's hard. I understand that. But here I am, right here, right now.
translation.zh: ‎很难 我明白 但我现在就在这里

translation.en: And I am standing here with the only friend I have in the entire world.
translation.zh: ‎我和全世界唯一的朋友一起站在这里

translation.en: I'm staring at the woman that I love,
and I'm begging you to trust me.
I'm telling you, you can trust me.
Just let me in, please.
Let me in.
Tell me
you don't love me.
Jake, that's Alan. You gotta go.
You tell me that you don't love me and I'll go.
translation.zh: ‎告诉我你不爱我 我就离开

translation.en: I don't love you.
Saw your truck, thought we'd pop by and wish you Merry Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎看到你的车
‎我们觉得该来祝你圣诞快乐

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
Yes, I was packing up a few things, then I need to lock up, and then take off, so…
translation.zh: ‎我在收拾东西 上锁然后离开

translation.en: Would you care to join us for dinner? We'd love to have you.
translation.zh:
‎要一起吃晚餐吗？
‎我们很乐意和你一起

translation.en: We really would. We're having a few people over.
translation.zh: ‎真的很乐意 还会有几个人过来

translation.en: It's Christmas dinner, all the trimmings.
I would, I would love to, and thank you, but I should take off before the roads get too slick.
translation.zh:
‎我很想去
‎但我要赶在路面打滑前离开

translation.en: How did things go with your father?
Um, you know, they… Better than expected. Much better, actually.
translation.zh: ‎比预想的要好 其实是好很多

translation.en: -I told you. -You did.
And Rachel and her mom?
I think that's gonna work itself out.
That's very good news. Excellent.
Oh, bloody hell, I've gotta go baste the ham. You sure you can't stay?
translation.zh:
‎该死的 我要去卤火腿了
‎你确定不能留下来？

translation.en: Well, Happy Christmas, old boy.
-Happy basting. -[Ellie] I'll be right there.
Come on in.
And you and Rachel?
No? Really? I was so sure.
translation.zh:
‎没成吗？真的吗？
‎我本来对你们有信心的

translation.en: Well, Kerouac said it.
"It all ends in tears, anyway."
translation.zh: ‎“无论怎样 一切都会以眼泪结束”

translation.en: But I'll be okay, and Rachel will be okay too.
translation.zh: ‎但我会没事的 瑞秋也会没事

translation.en: Of course.
Merry Christmas.
For me? What did you do here?
Oh, Ellie…
You put the… tree back in.
Yes.
I have wonderful memories of this house.
translation.zh: ‎我对这栋房子有美好的回忆

translation.en: You and Benji playing in the yard.
Your folks.
Merry Christmas.
-Take care. -Oh, you too. Take care of yourself too.
And thank you. This is just… You're special.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 这真的…你太特别了
